rules_text:
Vigorbreath Scourge enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Vigorbreath Scourge attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. Then if its power is 6 or greater, draw a card. [i](Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)[/i]
